privates.name: Old Landing Site
privates.description: When buying the Private, the investor must immediately place the black "SD" token on any "Mineral" hex on the board.  The token blocks an SD slot when roads are built in the hex.  If sold to a Corporation, the black SD token will function as a fourth Supply Depot for that Corporation.  The purchaser of the Old Landing Site Private Company automatically gets last place in SR 5 turn order.

privates.name: UN Contract
privates.description: Sell for 1-50c.  The President gets a personal one-time bonus of 80c when connecting a road to an off-map location (arrows in the four corners of the map).  If this is done, the UN project starts, which results in a UN transport purchase at the start of OR5.  Discard this private at the end of OR6 or when the bonus is collected.

privates.name: Space Bridge Company
privates.description: Sell for 1-80c.  The Corporation owning the Space Bridge Company can build and upgrade road tiles crossing the rift as normal during the game.  All other Corporations can also run their transports over completed roads across the rift.

privates.name: Research Lab
privates.description: Sell for 1-120c.  At the start of an OR, the owner may place a "+20c" marker in any resource hex on the map.  The new value of the resource hex will last until the end of the game.  Discard this Private once the +20 marker is placed on the board.

privates.name: Space Port
privates.description: Sell for 1-160c.  The Corporation owning the Space Port Private can place the Space Port tile for free in addition to building regular road tiles.  The Corporation may also place its cheapest SD token on the tile for free at the same time. Placed Space Port tile discards this private

privates.name: Tunnel Company
privates.description: Sell for 1-200c.  When sold to a Corporation, if any 10% shares remain, the bank pays the Corporation for a 10% share that is given to the Investor without cost.

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit
Players may own more than 60% of this corporation
Players may purchase any number of shares of this corporation in one stock action

up: all shares owned by Investors and Corporations, or when should move right but cannot
down: per share sold or when should move left but cannot
right: pay dividend at least half of current share price, but less than two times current share price
2x right: pay dividend at least two times current share price

legend.description: Corporation bankrupt and removed from game
